title: Build Smart Study Buddy - Student Study App with Planner, Timer, Notes, Flashcards, and AI Assistant

requirements.text: Implement a Daily Study Planner where users can add subjects (Science, Maths, English, etc.), set study time for each subject, and view a simple timetable displaying all planned study sessions

quotes: Users can add subjects (Science, Maths, English, etc.)
Set study time for each subject

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new subjects with custom names
Users can assign a study time duration to each subject
A timetable view displays all subjects with their allocated study times
Users can edit or delete existing subjects and their study times

requirements.text: Create a Pomodoro Focus Timer with 25-minute focus sessions and 5-minute breaks, including start, pause, and reset controls, and display motivational messages after each completed session
acceptanceCriteria: Timer alternates between 25-minute focus and 5-minute break periods
Start button initiates the timer countdown
Pause button stops the timer and allows resuming from the same point
Reset button returns the timer to its initial state
A motivational message is displayed when a focus session completes
Timer persists state during the session

requirements.text: Build a Notes Section where users can write and save short notes, organize notes by subject, and edit or delete existing notes easily

quotes: Users can write and save short notes

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new notes with title and content
Each note can be tagged with a subject for organization
Notes are grouped or filterable by subject
Users can edit existing note content
Users can delete notes with confirmation
All notes persist across sessions

requirements.text: Implement a Flashcards Mode for quick revision where users can create flashcards with questions on the front and answers on the back, and swipe through cards for review

quotes: Question on front, answer on back

acceptanceCriteria: Users can create new flashcards with a question and answer
Flashcards can be organized by subject or topic
In review mode, the question is displayed first
Users can flip or tap to reveal the answer
Users can swipe left or right to navigate between flashcards
Flashcards persist and can be edited or deleted

requirements.text: Create an Exam Countdown feature where users can add exam dates and view the number of days remaining until each exam on the dashboard

quotes: Show days left for exams on dashboard

acceptanceCriteria: Users can add exams with name, subject, and date
Dashboard displays all upcoming exams with countdown in days
Countdown updates automatically based on current date
Users can edit or delete exam entries
Past exams are either archived or clearly marked as completed

requirements.text: Build an AI Study Assistant chatbot that explains topics in easy, beginner-friendly language, responds like a friendly teacher, and provides short, clear explanations to help students understand concepts

quotes: Simple chatbot to explain topics in easy language
Should respond like a friendly teacher

acceptanceCriteria: Chat interface allows users to ask questions about study topics
AI assistant responds with explanations appropriate for Class 8-12 students
Responses are concise and use simple, accessible language
Chat history is visible during the session
Assistant maintains a friendly, encouraging tone

requirements.text: Implement a Progress Tracker that displays daily study streak, tracks total hours studied per day, and shows progress through a simple visual progress bar
acceptanceCriteria: System tracks consecutive days of study activity as a streak
Dashboard displays current streak count prominently
Total study hours for the current day are calculated and displayed
A progress bar or similar visual element shows study progress
Progress data persists across sessions
Study time is logged from Pomodoro sessions or manual entries

requirements.text: Design a minimal, beginner-friendly UI with a light theme using soft, calming colors (avoiding overwhelming blues and purples), large easy-to-tap buttons, clear readable text, and a mobile-responsive layout suitable for students

quotes: Keep the app very lightweight, mobile-friendly

acceptanceCriteria: UI uses a light theme with soft, gentle color palette appropriate for extended study sessions
All interactive elements (buttons, inputs) are large enough for easy touch interaction
Typography is clear and highly readable with appropriate font sizes
Layout is clean and uncluttered with ample whitespace
Navigation is intuitive with minimal learning curve
App is fully responsive and works well on mobile devices
Design maintains consistency across all features

constraints: Must work within single-actor Motoko backend architecture
No external database or cloud service integrations
AI Study Assistant must use only frontend-based solutions or simple prompt-response patterns
nonGoals: Complex analytics or data visualization beyond basic progress tracking
Gamification with points, levels, or rewards systems
Integration with external educational platforms or APIs

Calm study environment hero banner with desk and books for landing area (study-hero.dim_1200x400.png)
